text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1978. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Turma da Mônica (1976–present) ==Births== *13 January - Victor Pecoraro, actor & model *3 August - Anderson Di Rizzi, actor *6 October - Samara Felippo, actress *4 December - Katiuscia Canoro, actress ==Deaths== ==See also== *1978 in Brazil
title: 1978 in Brazilian television
